mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.sushe_id as susheId ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.xuesheng_uuid_number as xueshengUuidNumber ,a.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,a.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,a.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail ,a.xuesheng_qq as xueshengQq ,a.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,a.banji_types as banjiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,sushe.sushe_name as susheName ,sushe.loudong_types as loudongTypes
FROM xuesheng a left JOIN sushe sushe ON a.sushe_id = sushe.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.sushe_id = #{params.susheId}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.xuesheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengUuidNumber},'%')
and a.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and a.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and a.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
and a.xuesheng_qq like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengQq},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and a.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.sushe_id IS NOT NULL
and sushe.sushe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.susheName},'%')
and sushe.loudong_types = #{params.loudongTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sushe.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sushe.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
